title: Official Wizard of New Zealand fired by city council after more than 2 decades
content:
1. Official Wizard of New Zealand fired by city council after more than 2 decades  USA TODAY
  2. Christchurch takes the official 'Wizard Of New Zealand' off its payroll  NPR
  3. New Zealand city council lays off only state-appointed wizard in the world | TheHill  The Hill
  4. New Zealand government wizard fired over joke about hitting women: 'I don’t like being canceled'  New York Post
  5. Christchurch city council ends contract with 'wizard of New Zealand, Antarctica and relevant offshore areas'  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
